name: Deadline (itch) (USW Games, Cameron Harris, ljonskar, Conor.Douglas, RhianyddJenkins)
name_original: Deadline (itch) (USW Games, Cameron Harris, ljonskar, Conor.Douglas, RhianyddJenkins)
description:
Story
You are a student working hard on your final assignment and today is your deadline. The power cuts out as you prepare a submission, leaving you in the dark with only ten minutes to recover your work. Look around the classrooms to find backups of your assignment and find out why the building lost power. You haven’t got a lot of time left, and you feel something strange is lurking in the halls.

Controls
• WASD – move around
• Shift – sprint/walk faster
• E – interact with the world
• R – raise the phone
• T – interact with the phone

Credits for external assets
• David Libeau’s “Hacked” font https://www.fontspace.com/hacked-font-f28425
• edtijo’s “Creepy Horror Ambient – Truth” https://freesound.org/people/edtijo/sounds/231977/
• Hakren’s “Dark Ambient Synth” https://freesound.org/people/Hakren/sounds/425942/
• Robster881’s “Horror Ambience” https://freesound.org/people/Robster881/sounds/333220/
• burning-mir’s “terror ambience.mp3” https://freesound.org/people/burning-mir/sounds/155142/
• happyvector071’s “Creative of tv screen glitch vector image” https://www.vectorstock.com/royalty-free-vector/creative-of-tv-screen-glitch-vec...

This project was created as part of a second year university brief at the University of South Wales, in association with Tiny Rebel Games. The module brief was "These are our fears". Teams had to make games that were 8 to 10 minutes long, taking place in small environment that students frequently use, the theme of the game was student fears.
